name: Paths of Fight: Samurai
description:
Paths of Fight: Samurai is an original hack'n'slash puzzle game that challenges you to find the correct path and kill all enemies in the fight.
Think wisely, plan your moves, slash enemies, and finish them with powerful combos.
Play as a Samurai in a series of combats that require strategic and logical thinking to succeed.



Slash your enemies with each move.


Move wisely, cause each move counts


Finish with style.

Featuring:

  • Original mechanics. Move through the lines and find the correct path to kill all enemies.
  • 40+ hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity.
  • Beautiful environments of Japan in the feudal era.
  • Easy controls. Only mouse clicks.
